English.Text: Filled with doubt, they do as instructed. The conditions are dreadful, and they can barely see to work in the sideways slather and what with the waves buffeting the ship. A man falls from the upper rigging, and is found to be only loosely intact. "What are you trying to prove?!" bellows the navigator above the whine of the wind. Finally, the sails are put up and the boat can ride out the remainder of the storm without blowing off course. Your crew are incensed at the coldness of their superiors.
